structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Prerequisites to becoming licensed fire protection sprinkler contractor.
law.text:
To become a licensed fire protection sprinkler contractor under KRS 198B.560, a person must comply with the following:
Must have in his employ a certificate holder;
Comply with the minimum insurance requirements of KRS 198B.595; and
Make application to the commissioner for a license and pay the fees required.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 277, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 383, sec. 7, effective July 13, 1984.
